title: Rune Sale?
body: Is there still going to be a rune sale? i thought i heard that T3 runes were going to be discounted for the start of Season 5.

replies.body: it has been live since 8am this morning...
Sometime today there is supposed to be (along with 2 for 1 rune pages, boosts and summoner name change sale) it's just Riot OCE being lazy with the actual time it comes out.
